flawed_nl_solution:
He needs to walk 63000 steps in a week because 7 x 9000 = <<7*9000=63000>>63000
He has 18010 steps to walk on Friday and Saturday because 63000 - 9400 - 9100 - 8300 - 9200 - 8900 = <<63000-9400-9100-8300-9200-8900=18010>>18010
He needs to walk an average of 9005 on Friday and Saturday because 18010 / 2 = <<18010/2=9005>>9005
#### 9005

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 18100, not 18010. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
